com.mlt.ml.network

Interface Persistent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Activation, Collector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivationBipolarSigmoid, ActivationNode, ActivationReLU, ActivationSigmoid, ActivationSoftMax, ActivationTANH, AdditionNode, BiasNode, BranchNode, CollectorAddition, CollectorCentroid, CollectorTransfer, ConcatNode, Filter1DNode, Filter2DNode, Node, Pool1DNode, Pool2DNode, SwitchNode, WeightsNode

    public interface Persistent
    Interface that must implement all objects involved in a computational network graph, to restore/save their internal data.

    Objects that implement the Persistent interface must provide a default constructor.

    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Restore from an input stream.
